title: nhanesqc: Introduction
text: nhanesqc provides quick, structured quality control tools NHANES datasets, including: support CSV, XPT, -memory data frames variable-level summaries detection NHANES-style special missing codes (7, 9, 77, 99, 777, 999, etc.) custom print(), summary(), plot() methods vignette walks simple QC workflow using real NHANES table.

title: nhanesqc: Introduction
text: example, use nhanesA package download DEMO_H (demographics) table:

title: nhanesqc: Introduction
text: can pass data frame directly nhanes_qc(): printed output shows: source (data frame input) number rows columns preview variable summary preview variables special missing codes
code: qc <- nhanes_qc(demo_h)  qc #> NHANES QC result #>  #> File:   <data.frame input> #> Rows:   10175 #> Cols:   47 #>  #> Variable summary (preview): #> # A tibble: 6 × 5 #>   variable class   n_missing prop_missing n_unique #>   <chr>    <chr>       <int>        <dbl>    <int> #> 1 seqn     numeric         0        0        10175 #> 2 sddsrvyr factor          0        0            1 #> 3 ridstatr factor          0        0            2 #> 4 riagendr factor          0        0            2 #> 5 ridageyr numeric         0        0           81 #> 6 ridagemn numeric      9502        0.934       26 #> ... (41 more variables) #>  #> Missingness / special codes (preview): #> # A tibble: 4 × 6 #>   variable  n_na prop_na n_special prop_special special_codes_found #>   <chr>    <int>   <dbl>     <int>        <dbl> <chr>               #> 1 ridageyr     0   0           484      0.0476  7, 77, 9            #> 2 ridagemn  9502   0.934        76      0.00747 7, 9                #> 3 ridexagm  5962   0.586       110      0.0108  7, 77, 9, 99        #> 4 dmdhrage     0   0            46      0.00452 77                  #>  #> Use: #>   qc$variables    # full variable summary #>   qc$missingness  # full missingness / special-code summary

title: nhanesqc: Introduction
text: detailed text summary: reports: overall proportion missing values many variables missing data many variables NHANES-style special codes top variables missingness special-code frequency
code: summary(qc) #> Summary of NHANES QC result #>  #> Dimensions: #>   Rows:   10175 #>   Cols:   47 #>  #> Overall missingness (across all cells): #>   Total missing values: 82092 #>   Proportion missing:   0.172 #>  #> Variables with missing values:      26 #> Variables with special codes found: 4 #>  #> Top variables by proportion missing (up to 10): #> # A tibble: 10 × 3 #>    variable  n_na prop_na #>    <chr>    <int>   <dbl> #>  1 dmqadfc   9632   0.947 #>  2 ridagemn  9502   0.934 #>  3 ridexprg  8866   0.871 #>  4 dmdyrsus  8267   0.812 #>  5 dmdeduc3  7372   0.725 #>  6 ridexagm  5962   0.586 #>  7 dmdhsedu  4833   0.475 #>  8 dmdeduc2  4406   0.433 #>  9 dmdmartl  4406   0.433 #> 10 dmqmiliz  3914   0.385 #>  #> Variables with NHANES-style special codes (up to 10): #> # A tibble: 4 × 4 #>   variable n_special prop_special special_codes_found #>   <chr>        <int>        <dbl> <chr>               #> 1 ridageyr       484      0.0476  7, 77, 9            #> 2 ridexagm       110      0.0108  7, 77, 9, 99        #> 3 ridagemn        76      0.00747 7, 9                #> 4 dmdhrage        46      0.00452 77

title: nhanesqc: Introduction
text: can also visualize QC results using plot() method.

title: nhanesqc: Introduction
text: Proportion missing variable

title: nhanesqc: Introduction
text: Proportion NHANES-style special codes variable plots highlight variables missingness special-code usage.

title: nhanesqc: Introduction
text: nhanesqc focuses detection, automatic recoding: NHANES uses different special codes different variables Blindly recoding 7/9/77/99/etc. NA risks removing valid values (e.g., age = 77) goal package : help quickly identify potential missingness patterns surface NHANES-style special codes provide clean starting point downstream modeling, recoding, analysis Future versions explore codebook-aware recoding based NHANES documentation, variable-specific rules can applied safely transparently.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Chayce Reed. Author, maintainer.

what: Quick Quality Control for NHANES Datasets
title: Quick Quality Control for NHANES Datasets
text: Welcome nhanesqc — lightweight R toolkit performs quick, structured quality control NHANES datasets (CSV, XPT, data frames). nhanesqc built public-health, epidemiology, biomedical, data-science workflows rely NHANES need fast, reproducible quality control deeper analysis.

title: Quick Quality Control for NHANES Datasets
text: One-command QC NHANES files: Automatic format detection .csv → readr::read_csv() .xpt → haven::read_xpt() data frames → used directly Clean column names (snake_case) tibble output Variable summaries, including: column type number unique values missingness counts basic structure NHANES special missing-code detection, covering: 7 / 9 77 / 99 777 / 999 7777 / 9999 (automatic recoding; detection ) Custom S3 methods: print() — preview summary() — full text output plot() — missingness special-code visualizations Plot options: plot(qc) → missingness plot(qc, type = “special”) → NHANES-style special codes Minimal dependencies; fast enough large NHANES tables.

title: Quick Quality Control for NHANES Datasets

what: 1. Quick QC on a CSV file
title: Quick Quality Control for NHANES Datasets

what: 2. Run QC directly on an XPT file
title: Quick Quality Control for NHANES Datasets

what: 3. Run QC on a data frame
title: Quick Quality Control for NHANES Datasets
code: library(nhanesA) demo_h <- nhanesA::nhanes("DEMO_H")  qc <- nhanes_qc(demo_h) qc NHANES QC result  File:   <data.frame input> Rows:   10175 Cols:   47  Variable summary (preview): # A tibble: 6 × 5   variable class   n_missing prop_missing n_unique   <chr>    <chr>       <int>        <dbl>    <int> 1 seqn     numeric         0        0        10175 2 sddsrvyr factor          0        0            1 3 ridstatr factor          0        0            2 4 riagendr factor          0        0            2 5 ridageyr numeric         0        0           81 6 ridagemn numeric      9502        0.934       26 ... (41 more variables)  Missingness / special codes (preview): # A tibble: 4 × 6   variable  n_na prop_na n_special prop_special special_codes_found   <chr>    <int>   <dbl>     <int>        <dbl> <chr>               1 ridageyr     0   0           484      0.0476  7, 77, 9            2 ridagemn  9502   0.934        76      0.00747 7, 9                3 ridexagm  5962   0.586       110      0.0108  7, 77, 9, 99        4 dmdhrage     0   0            46      0.00452 77                   Use:   qc$variables    # full variable summary   qc$missingness  # full missingness / special-code summary

title: Quick Quality Control for NHANES Datasets
code: summary(qc) Summary of NHANES QC result  Dimensions:   Rows:   10175   Cols:   47  Overall missingness (across all cells):   Total missing values: 82092   Proportion missing:   0.172  Variables with missing values:      26 Variables with special codes found: 4  Top variables by proportion missing (up to 10): # A tibble: 10 × 3    variable  n_na prop_na    <chr>    <int>   <dbl>  1 dmqadfc   9632   0.947  2 ridagemn  9502   0.934  3 ridexprg  8866   0.871  4 dmdyrsus  8267   0.812  5 dmdeduc3  7372   0.725  6 ridexagm  5962   0.586  7 dmdhsedu  4833   0.475  8 dmdeduc2  4406   0.433  9 dmdmartl  4406   0.433 10 dmqmiliz  3914   0.385  Variables with NHANES-style special codes (up to 10): # A tibble: 4 × 4   variable n_special prop_special special_codes_found   <chr>        <int>        <dbl> <chr>               1 ridageyr       484      0.0476  7, 77, 9            2 ridexagm       110      0.0108  7, 77, 9, 99        3 ridagemn        76      0.00747 7, 9                4 dmdhrage        46      0.00452 77

title: Quick Quality Control for NHANES Datasets
Quick Quality Control for NHANES Datasets
Quick Quality Control for NHANES Datasets
text: NHANES variables use different special-code patterns, blind recoding can incorrectly mark real values (e.g., age = 77) missing. nhanesqc focuses safe detection, automatic recoding. future version include codebook-aware recoding.

title: Quick Quality Control for NHANES Datasets
text: MIT License. See LICENSE details

what: Detect NHANES-style special missing codes (detection only) — nhanes_missingness_summary
title: Detect NHANES-style special missing codes (detection only) — nhanes_missingness_summary
text: NHANES often uses numeric codes like 7, 9, 77, 99, 777, 999 (similar) represent special missing values "Refused" "know". function: scans variable special codes counts often appear reports codes present per variable IMPORTANT: function modify input data. intended detection QC helper. Actual recoding NA done explicitly user future, codebook-aware function.

title: Detect NHANES-style special missing codes (detection only) — nhanes_missingness_summary
code: nhanes_missingness_summary(   df,   special_codes = c(7, 9, 77, 99, 777, 999, 7777, 9999),   exclude_vars = c("seqn") )

title: Detect NHANES-style special missing codes (detection only) — nhanes_missingness_summary
text: df data frame tibble, typically read_nhanes_csv(). special_codes vector NHANES-style special codes. Numeric character. exclude_vars character vector variable names exclude detection (example, ID variables like "seqn").

title: Detect NHANES-style special missing codes (detection only) — nhanes_missingness_summary
text: list : data - original data frame (unchanged) summary - tibble one row per variable, including: variable n_rows n_na prop_na n_special prop_special special_codes_found

what: Quick QC for a NHANES-style dataset (CSV, XPT, or data frame) — nhanes_qc
title: Quick QC for a NHANES-style dataset (CSV, XPT, or data frame) — nhanes_qc
text: High-level helper : accepts either file path -memory data frame path provided: reads NHANES-style file (CSV XPT) summarizes variables nhanes_variable_summary() detects NHANES-style special missing codes nhanes_missingness_summary() Supported inputs: Character path .csv files via read_nhanes_csv() Character path .xpt (SAS transport) files via read_nhanes_xpt() data frame tibble already memory (e.g., nhanesA::nhanes())

title: Quick QC for a NHANES-style dataset (CSV, XPT, or data frame) — nhanes_qc
code: nhanes_qc(   x,   special_codes = c(7, 9, 77, 99, 777, 999, 7777, 9999),   exclude_vars = c("seqn"),   ... )

title: Quick QC for a NHANES-style dataset (CSV, XPT, or data frame) — nhanes_qc
text: x Either: character string giving file path NHANES file (.csv .xpt), data frame / tibble containing NHANES-style data. special_codes vector special missing codes scan . Passed nhanes_missingness_summary(). exclude_vars Variables exclude special-code detection (example, ID variables like "seqn"). ... Additional arguments passed underlying reader x file path: readr::read_csv() CSV, haven::read_xpt() XPT.

title: Quick QC for a NHANES-style dataset (CSV, XPT, or data frame) — nhanes_qc
text: list : path - file path provided, "<data.frame input>" n_rows - number rows data n_cols - number columns data data - loaded/processed data (tibble) variables - variable-level summary (nhanes_variable_summary()) missingness - missingness + special-code detection summary (nhanes_missingness_summary(), $summary component)

what: Summarize variables in a NHANES-style data frame — nhanes_variable_summary
title: Summarize variables in a NHANES-style data frame — nhanes_variable_summary
text: Provides high-level summary column data frame: variable name class (type) number rows number proportion missing values number unique values simple type flags (numeric / categorical) general summary yet apply NHANES-specific missing-code logic (e.g., 7/9/77/99). handled dedicated missingness function.

title: Summarize variables in a NHANES-style data frame — nhanes_variable_summary
Summarize variables in a NHANES-style data frame — nhanes_variable_summary
text: df data frame tibble, typically created read_nhanes_csv().

title: Summarize variables in a NHANES-style data frame — nhanes_variable_summary
text: tibble one row per variable summary statistics.

what: Plot method for nhanes_qc_result objects — plot.nhanes_qc_result
title: Plot method for nhanes_qc_result objects — plot.nhanes_qc_result
text: Simple visualization NHANES QC results. Currently supports: type = "missing": barplot proportion missing variable type = "special": barplot proportion special codes variable top top_n variables (chosen metric) shown.

title: Plot method for nhanes_qc_result objects — plot.nhanes_qc_result
code: # S3 method for class 'nhanes_qc_result' plot(x, type = c("missing", "special"), top_n = 20, ...)

title: Plot method for nhanes_qc_result objects — plot.nhanes_qc_result
text: x object class nhanes_qc_result, returned nhanes_qc(). type Character; either "missing" "special". top_n Integer; number variables show (sorted descending). ... Additional arguments passed graphics::barplot().

title: Plot method for nhanes_qc_result objects — plot.nhanes_qc_result
text: result graphics::barplot(), invisibly.

what: Print method for nhanes_qc_result objects — print.nhanes_qc_result
title: Print method for nhanes_qc_result objects — print.nhanes_qc_result
text: Print method nhanes_qc_result objects

title: Print method for nhanes_qc_result objects — print.nhanes_qc_result
Print method for nhanes_qc_result objects — print.nhanes_qc_result
text: x object class nhanes_qc_result, returned nhanes_qc(). ... Additional arguments (currently ignored).

title: Print method for nhanes_qc_result objects — print.nhanes_qc_result
text: input object x, invisibly.

what: Read a NHANES-style CSV file — read_nhanes_csv
title: Read a NHANES-style CSV file — read_nhanes_csv
text: Convenience wrapper around readr::read_csv() NHANES data. function: checks file exists reads CSV using readr cleans column names (snake_case, lowercase) using janitor recoding NHANES-specific logic yet. layered top later functions.

title: Read a NHANES-style CSV file — read_nhanes_csv
Read a NHANES-style CSV file — read_nhanes_csv
text: path Path NHANES CSV file. ... Additional arguments passed readr::read_csv().

title: Read a NHANES-style CSV file — read_nhanes_csv
text: tibble cleaned column names.

what: Read a NHANES-style XPT (SAS transport) file — read_nhanes_xpt
title: Read a NHANES-style XPT (SAS transport) file — read_nhanes_xpt
text: Convenience wrapper around haven::read_xpt() NHANES data. function: checks file exists reads XPT file cleans column names (snake_case, lowercase) using janitor

title: Read a NHANES-style XPT (SAS transport) file — read_nhanes_xpt
Read a NHANES-style XPT (SAS transport) file — read_nhanes_xpt
text: path Path NHANES .xpt file. ... Additional arguments passed haven::read_xpt().

title: Read a NHANES-style XPT (SAS transport) file — read_nhanes_xpt
text: tibble cleaned column names.

what: Summary method for nhanes_qc_result objects — summary.nhanes_qc_result
title: Summary method for nhanes_qc_result objects — summary.nhanes_qc_result
text: Summary method nhanes_qc_result objects

title: Summary method for nhanes_qc_result objects — summary.nhanes_qc_result
code: # S3 method for class 'nhanes_qc_result' summary(object, top_n = 10, ...)

title: Summary method for nhanes_qc_result objects — summary.nhanes_qc_result
text: object object class nhanes_qc_result, returned nhanes_qc(). top_n Integer; many variables show "top missing" tables. ... Additional arguments (currently ignored).

title: Summary method for nhanes_qc_result objects — summary.nhanes_qc_result
text: list summary components (invisibly), printing human-readable summary console.
